title: looking for whoever owns the KAYN tag for an inv to the club :)
body:
Title says it all :)

 OCE ofc

replies.body:
Hiya :)

I believe it is *KaynMid* (the smurf account of *YellowBrickRoad*), because s/he has the *KAYN* tag. 

You can either add her/him in-game on either of the two accounts (although her/his *KaynMid* account is more active) and ask her/him, or wait for her/him to reply to your post (since s/he is fairly active on the Boards). 

I hope this helps :)

Thanks :D
